short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will provide you a shortened URL

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Want to create a shortened url? Just click the button and you're done. No need to navigate to url shortener page, copy and paste your url, then copy and paste it elsewhere.

This extension automatically gets the current tab url and automatically shortens it using the chadk.co/ url shortening service.
